content: materials - 4 skeins of purl soho s understory 1 50% baby alpaca 25% baby yak and 25% silk each skein is 250 yards/ 100 grams approximately 1000 yards required we used the color willow bark - us 7 4 5 mm 24- or 32-inch circular needles 3 gauge 18 stitches and 26 row = 4 inches in stockinette stitch size finished dimensions 20 inches wide x 73 inches long 1 https //www purlsoho com/understory 2 https //www purlsoho com/yarn/knitting-crochet html yarn_stitches_per_inch_filter=970 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html type_filter=881
